enhanced_by.reason: The logResolved method relies on the counters updated by the setValue method to log the outstanding, deferred, and resolved counts.
Both logResolved and toString methods provide insights into the state of the object, making assertions about the log output more robust.
Both logResolved and DeferredLogger.logValue methods involve logging operations, suggesting that assertions about log outputs can be informed by the behavior of DeferredLogger.logValue.
